About Me

A few things about me

BIO

Hi, I am Martins Odabi, a self taught software developer and game designer, with more than five years of coding experience and more than three years of Unity Game Programming, my passion of how things work has been the force that has kept me moving. I am currently trying to fit Japanese Kanji into my head, hope that works.

Application Developer and Game Designer
